author: blumm
msg: This fix allows multiple taglibs in a web.xml of a portlet application.

author: blumm
msg: This patch fixes the TBD in PortletRequest.

author: blumm
msg: changed "HTTP" GET to POST for compliance with Portlet-Spec.

author: blumm
msg: Changed all non-static nested classes of PortletFragment, i.e. PortletInfo, PortletModeInfo and PortletWindowStateInfo to be static nested classes.
This change should make Pluto's own, experimental portal run in a Weblogic environment, too.
